Name: Million Dollar Margarita
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Although a relatively dry Margarita this particular millionaire benefits from the rich orange notes of a cognac-based orange liqueur.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2006 at Maison 140 Hotel in Los Angeles, USA where we paid a mere $41.14 plus tip for one.
Nutrition: One serving of Million Dollar Margarita contains 191 calories
